plot: Margo tries to make Clarke jealous by using her past with Ridge, but Clarke remains unmoved and switches the topic. Margo has a hard time digesting that Clarke wants to continue to pass of his Forrester designs as Kristen's and not hers. Bill discusses the order of events of tonight's wrap party with Caroline and advises her against inviting Ridge. Caroline therefore asks Ridge to behave himself at her party. Bill warns Thorne about Ridge. Thorne wants to put a stop to his jealousy after his argument with Caroline last night. Kristen catches Clarke in a lie and makes the correct guess that another woman stayed at his apartment while they made love. Clarke takes a drastic step forward to prove his feelings for her and stuns Kristen with a marriage proposal.—Torsten B. Tomaschek
